org.kepler.ddp.director

Class DDPEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.ddp.director.DDPEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HadoopEngine, SparkEngine, StratosphereEngine

    public abstract class DDPEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A base class for DDP engines.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> _additionalJars
      A set of additional jar names to send to the server.
      protected java.lang.ClassLoader _classLoader
      The ClassLoader class for loading implementation class for DDP actors.
      protected java.lang.String _configDirStr
      DDP Engine configuration directory.
      protected static int _CONNECT_TIMEOUT
      Timeout when seeing if server is running.
      protected CompositeActor _container
      The container of this director.
      protected int _degreeOfParallelism
      The default degree of parallelism for ddp pattern actors.
      protected DDPDirector _director
      The containing director.
      protected java.lang.String _displayRedirectDir
      Directory for display redirect.
      protected java.lang.String _engineName
      The name of the engine.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> _jobArgumentsMap
      A collection of job arguments as key-values.
      protected java.lang.String _jobDir
      Directory for the current job.
      protected java.lang.Object _jobLock
      A lock for DDP jobs.
      protected boolean _sameJVM
      If true, run and use server in the same JVM as Kepler.
      protected static java.lang.Object _serverStartStopLock
      A static object used for synchronization.
      protected static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SingleInputPatternActor> _subWorkflows
      A mapping of model name to model.
      protected boolean _writeSubWorkflowsToFiles
      If true, write the sub-workflows to files, otherwise pass them as to in the configuration object.

      • _checkFilesBeforeStartingServer

        protected boolean _checkFilesBeforeStartingServer()
                                           throws IllegalActionException
        Check the existence of required files before starting the DDP server. The list of required files is found in configuration.xml for each engine, in Engine.Server.Required.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

                    throws IllegalActionException

      • _checkServer

        protected boolean _checkServer(java.net.InetSocketAddress socketAddress,
                               java.lang.String startScriptStr)
                        throws IllegalActionException
        Check if the DDP engine server is running. If not, try to start it.
        Parameters:
        socketAddress - Host and port of the server to check.
        startScriptStr - The script to start the server if not running.
        Returns:
        True if a server was started, false if could connect to already running server.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

      • _copyParameters

        protected void _copyParameters(DDPPatternActor sourceSubWorkflow,
                               DDPPatternActor destSubWorkflow)
                        throws IllegalActionException
        Copy the workflow parameters from one sub-workflow to another including the parameters in all the containers of the source.
        Parameters:
        sourceSubWorkflow - the source sub-workflow
        destSubWorkflow - the destination sub-workflow
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

      • _getJarList

        protected java.util.List<java.net.URI> _getJarList()
                                            throws IllegalActionException
        Get a list of jars required for director to start. It also set _classLoader value based on the jars.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException

      • _parseOutputFromStartingServer

        protected java.net.InetSocketAddress _parseOutputFromStartingServer(java.io.InputStream input)
                                                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                    IllegalActionException
        Parse the output from the script that starts the server. In this class, does nothing and returns null.
        Returns:
        If the start script specifies a server URL, returns the socket address for that URL. Otherwise, returns null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        IllegalActionException

      • _removeParameters

        protected void _removeParameters()
                          throws IllegalActionException,
                                 NameDuplicationException
        Remove engine-specific parameters from the director. Does nothing in this base class.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException
        NameDuplicationException
